alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 8:46PM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches for the mountains around Sandpoint and Bonners Ferry. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches for the mountains around Kellogg, Mullan, and Clarkia. * WHERE...Lookout Pass, Eastport, Dobson Pass, Schweitzer Mountain Road, and Mullan. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Lookout Pass at an elevation near 4700 feet on Interstate 90 will receive periods of moderate to heavy snow through Sunday morning. Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions on I-90 near the Idaho and Montana border.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
